byline.original: By ROB COX and AGNES T. CRANE

snippet: The case of Live Nation Entertainment shows that aborting deals is not always necessary to foster competition. Extracting concessions can work instead.
lead_paragraph: The case of Live Nation Entertainment shows that aborting deals is not always necessary to foster competition. Extracting concessions can work instead.

headline.main: Altering a Deal Without Blocking it
headline.seo: Altering a Deal Without Blocking it
headline.print_headline: Altering a Deal Without Blocking it
